item.description:
Hello,

We have an exciting lineup of speakers scheduled for the summer.  We will kick off the luncheon speaker series with Abby Grant of Boston Business Journal (BBJ) who will present on "How to Use the BBJ as a Research Tool in Your Professional Development and Job Search."

This promises to be an information packed presentation and as a bonus, all attendees will receive a free four week trial subscription to the BBJ.

Hope to see many of you there.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in a private space.
item.name: First Luncheon Speaker Scheduled!
